title: Florida rejects 41% of new math textbooks, citing critical race theory among its reasons - CNN
content:
1. Florida rejects 41% of new math textbooks, citing critical race theory among its reasons  CNN
  2. Florida rejects 41% of math textbooks for including CRT, most aimed at K-5 students: 'Impermissible'  Fox News
  3. Florida education officials reject 54 math textbooks for ‘attempts to indoctrinate students’  WKMG News 6 & ClickOrlando
  4. Florida rejects math textbooks for 'prohibited' topics including critical race theory  The Washington Post
  5. Ron DeSantis' Team Defend Rejecting 'CRT Math Textbooks,' Share Examples  Newsweek
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: The Florida Department of Education announced Friday that the state has rejected more than 50 math textbooks from next school year's curriculum, citing references to critical race theory among reasons for the rejections.
